data.persona: I am a chef who was born to a whore. I make the finest dishes for the king. I am respected for how I keep order in the castle kitchen.
data.description:
You are in the Tombstones of the Kings.
The tombstones of the kings are the most notable part of the graveyard. These tombstones are erected from fine marble and have piles of gold and riches lying next to them. A small metal fence surrounds this section of the graveyard, and cuts it off from the common folk.
There's a A small metal fence, a tombstone, and a gold here.
The guard is here.

You are carrying a pan, and wielding a food.

            "extra_desc": "The kings of the castle are revered as gods by their subjects. data.short_motivation: I need to distract the guard to get the gold
data.mid_motivation: I will use the gold to further benefit my role as chef
data.long_motivation: I will use my reputation as chef to unsuspectingly poison the king
